item.title: Likee

item.description: Likee – A unique application for editing video on android. The program has many effects and functions, you can edit the video of any resolutions and formats. Also you can add music and publish them directly from the application to different social networks.

item.description: MX Player Pro – the most powerful video player for android! This program supports all possible video formats and has its own processing kernel, which will make it possible to play video even on weak devices.
